attributes.action: deport illegal immigrants held in british prisons back to country of origin.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British penal system is overstretched with the amount of prisoners held in British prisons. I request illegal immigrant prisoners held in British prisons for crimes against the person and property be sent back to their home country to continue their detention at no cost to british tax payers.

rejection.details: This peition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Asylumseek/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
